settings.heading: SHOW YOUR SKIN THE LOVE IT DESERVES
settings.title: BAM Signature Facial
settings.body: Whether you’re looking for a relaxing treatment to pamper yourself or need a skin revitalization before a special occasion — or both — Balanced Aesthetics Medspa has the perfect solution: the BAM Signature Facial.

settings.text: Because the BAM Signature Facial is customized to every client’s unique skin type and condition, there’s a version that’s perfect for you. Your consultation with your Balanced Aesthetics esthetician will begin with an in-depth conversation about your goals and concerns. We’ll evaluate your unique skin and recommend the best techniques and products to round out your personal BAM Signature Facial.

You’ll leave the luxurious offices of Balanced Aesthetics Medspa feeling rejuvenated and refreshed, with a complexion that glows and is ready for a special occasion, a night at home decompressing, or anything in between. Many of our clients schedule BAM Signature Facials to keep their skin healthy between more intensive therapies. If you become a BAMFAM member, part of your membership includes a complimentary monthly BAM Signature Facial to keep your complexion glowing and ready for anything.

settings.question: What’s Included in the BAM Signature Facial?
settings.answer: We incorporate deep pore cleansing, extractions (if recommended), dermaplaning, our favorite IMAGE products —including the masque—and round your relaxing treatment out with skincare products that fulfill your aesthetic goals and suit your skin type. Like any good facial, the BAM Signature Facial will pamper your skin by clearing away dead cells and debris, extracting impurities, and prepping it to receive the best in skincare products we can offer.

settings.question: What’s the BAM Signature Facial Like?
settings.answer: This is where your indulgent BAM Signature Facial begins. We follow the steps laid out in your customized treatment plan, beginning with cleansing and exfoliating. We follow that up with your chosen facial products to make your treatment as relaxing as possible. When you’re done, you’ll feel like you’ve received the royal treatment, and your skin will look and feel fabulous.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: Not only is there no downtime, but this treatment can also help recharge your batteries while it boosts your complexion.

settings.heading: SKILLED, CARING PROFESSIONALS
settings.title: BAMFAM Membership
settings.body: For only $100 per month, start your membership today and begin enjoying all of the benefits of becoming part of the BAMFAM! Receive monthly, complimentary BAM Signature Facial treatments, discounts on retail products, and more.

settings.heading: Contact Us
settings.message: Call us at (470) 226-2390for a free consultation with our team.
